Html:
There are some discrepancies with the stats when loaded from the armory.
The Attack Power and Critical Strike ratings are off, showing that I have 300 more Attack Power and 1% less Critical Strike.
Is this an error or something I'm doing wrong?
Edit:These are links to my armory and of rawr's load from the armory.
Armory
Rawr
I've also checked that there are no buffs selected.

Regarding the AP, Rawr calculates in the effective AP from procs and uses on your items (i.e. the mouse over the Libram and see that it gives you 88.89AP).

About the crit though, were you buffed at all when you took the armory SS?

Nope, no buffs were on except for Crusader Aura.
But thanks for the info on the AP on items.
Aha, I found the problem, Cloak of Darkness' melee crit rating wasn't showing up and it won't show up when I refresh it too.
I'll go and put it in manually.
Ah yes, that's an interesting item... Rawr just doesn't understand the Melee Crit Rating stat... No other item that I know of has crit rating that only applies to melee.

I believe its a display issue with the armory. The crit value is shown as "bonus CritMeleeRating 24" for the Cloak of Darkness. I had to do the same thing when I got Rawr. I've sent Blizzard emails regarding the problem months ago when I got the cloak, and after getting a form email back, nothing was done.
